title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
Karlach. She punished Wyll for his disobedience by turning him into a devil and departed - though it seems likely we'll meet her again.

While traveling with Wyll, Mizora will make an appearance at the camp. If you flatter her, Wyll and Karlach will disapprove. Allow the scene to play out and if Karlach is still alive she will point out that the promise to kill Karlach has been broken and Wyll will pay the price.
